Song.title: I Am Coming to the Cross
Song.copyright: William McDonald 1870, Public Domain. Arrangement, alt words by Tim Schmidt.

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: [D] I am [G]coming [A]to the [D]cross I am [G]poor and [A]weak and [D]blind [D]I am [G]counting [A]life as [D]loss Sal[G]vation [A]I will [D]find
Verse 2: [D]How I [G]long to [A]be set [D]free From the [G]unbe[A]lief with[D]in [D]Jesus [G]sweetly [A]speaks to [D]me I have [G]cleansed you [A]from all [D]sin
Chorus: Jesus [G]comes He [A]fills my [D]soul Perfect [G]I am [A]made in [Bm]Him I [A]am [G]made com[A]pletely [D]whole Glory, [G]glory [A]to the [Bm]Lamb! Glo[A]ry, [G]glory [A]to the [D]Lamb!
{new_page} Verse 3: [D]In his [G]promi[A]ses I [D]trust Now I [G]feel the [A]blood ap[D]plied [D]I lay my [G]pride down [A]in the [D]dust I with [G]Christ am [A]cruci[D]fied.
Verse 4: [D]Here I [G]give Him [A]every[D]thing Friends and [G]time and [A]earthly [D]store [D]Jesus' [G]blood has [A]purchased [D]me I am [G]His for[A]ever[D]more
Chorus: Jesus [G]comes He [A]fills my [D]soul Perfect [G]I am [A]made in [Bm]Him I [A]am [G]made com[A]pletely [D]whole Glory, [G]glory [A]to the [Bm]Lamb! Glo[A]ry, [G]glory [A]to the [D]Lamb!
Bridge: [Bm] Worthy, [G]Worthy is the [D]Lamb that was [A]slain [Bm]Blessing, [G]honor and [D]glory to His [A]Name [Bm] Worthy, [G]Worthy is the [D]Lamb that was [A]slain [Bm]Blessing, [G]honor and [D]glory to His [A]Name
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 i am coming to the cross i am poor and weak and blind i am counting life as loss salvation i will find verse 2 how i long to be set free from the unbelief within jesus sweetly speaks to me i have cleansed you from all sin chorus jesus comes he fills my soul perfect i am made in him i am made completely whole glory glory to the lamb glory glory to the lamb verse 3 in his promises i trust now i feel the blood applied i lay my pride down in the dust i with christ am crucified verse 4 here i give him everything friends and time and earthly store jesus blood has purchased me i am his forevermore chorus jesus comes he fills my soul perfect i am made in him i am made completely whole glory glory to the lamb glory glory to the lamb bridge worthy worthy is the lamb that was slain blessing honor and glory to his name worthy worthy is the lamb that was slain blessing honor and glory to his name
